pullrequest.title: Add support for 16 bit Grayscale and RGB camera image types.

content.raw: I left the original checks in so it could exit fast without locking a mutex, but I wanted to check `cameras.empty()` again after getting the mutex to be safe. I did it for unsubstantiated performance reasons, so I'm ok with following your suggestion. Go ahead and change it if you prefer the fewer lines of code.
content.html: I left the original checks in so it could exit fast without locking a mutex, but I wanted to check cameras.empty() again after getting the mutex to be safe. I did it for unsubstantiated performance reasons, so I'm ok with following your suggestion. Go ahead and change it if you prefer the fewer lines of code.
